system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision widget list. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "widget list, container" date: "$Date: 2013-05-30 14:33:11 -0700 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92653 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_widget_list_i.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color, ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xmlEV_CONTAINER_IMP undefine ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_replacereplace, ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_gtk_insert_i_thgtk_insert_i_th redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_IMP [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_makemake end
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current do ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xmlEV_CONTAINER_IMP} ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_IMP} end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_insert_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem; i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Insert v at position i. local v_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_IMP do v_imp ?= v.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation check v_imp /= Void then end if v_imp /= Void then ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_gtk_insert_i_thgtk_insert_i_th (../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, v_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object, i - 1) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsego_i_th (i) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falseput_left (v) ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_on_new_itemon_new_item (v_imp) end end
f_remove_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Remove item at i-th position. local v_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_IMP a_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do a_index := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex v_imp ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_i_thi_th (i).../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_implementationimplementation check v_imp /= Void end if v_imp /= Void then ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsego_i_th (i) ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falseremove ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_on_removed_itemon_removed_item (v_imp) ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_gtk_container_removegtk_container_remove (../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget, v_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := a_index end end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_list_widget../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_list_widgetlist_widget: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the actual widget list container. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_widget_list.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_widget_list_imp.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST_IMP
